intro: Oxalis darapskyi, commonly known as the star oxalis, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Oxalidaceae family and is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped flowers. The plant features trifoliate leaves with reddish veins, giving it a striking appearance. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers partial to full sunlight. Oxalis darapskyi is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its vibrant blooms and unique foliage.
